# Obtaining the total number of favorites for Trump for tweets included in term matrix
trump_tweets <- as.numeric(data_matrix$dimnames$Docs)

favs_trump <- data %>% 
  select(X, favorite_count) %>% 
  filter(X<3215) %>% 
  filter(X %in% trump_tweets)

favs_trump_nort <- favs_trump
